targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_lcp <= 2500) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as value
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)
AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})

SELECT ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_inp <= 200) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as value
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)
AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})

SELECT ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as value
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)
AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})

SELECT ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_fcp <= 1800) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as value
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)
AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})

SELECT ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_ttfb <= 800) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as value
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)
AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})

panels.title: CWV Pass / Fail
panels.description: Sites passing ALL 3 core web vitals (LCP ≤ 2500ms, INP ≤ 200ms, CLS ≤ 0.10) vs sites failing any

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNTIF(p75_lcp <= 2500 AND p75_inp <= 200 AND p75_cls <= 0.10) as Pass,
  COUNTIF(NOT (p75_lcp <= 2500 AND p75_inp <= 200 AND p75_cls <= 0.10)) as Fail
FROM (
  SELECT origin,
    AVG(p75_lcp) as p75_lcp,
    AVG(p75_inp) as p75_inp,
    AVG(p75_cls) as p75_cls
  FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
  WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)
  AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})
  AND p75_lcp IS NOT NULL AND p75_inp IS NOT NULL AND p75_cls IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY origin
)

panels.title: Pass Rate by Device
panels.description: CWV pass rates broken down by device type

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  device,
  COUNT(DISTINCT origin) as sites,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_lcp <= 2500) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as lcp_pass_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_inp <= 200) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as inp_pass_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as cls_pass_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_lcp <= 2500 AND p75_inp <= 200 AND p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as cwv_pass_pct,
  ROUND(AVG(p75_lcp), 0) as avg_lcp,
  ROUND(AVG(p75_inp), 0) as avg_inp,
  ROUND(AVG(p75_cls), 2) as avg_cls
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)
AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})
AND device IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY device
ORDER BY device

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m', CAST(yyyymm AS STRING))) as time,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_lcp <= 2500) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as lcp_good_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_inp <= 200) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as inp_good_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as cls_good_pct
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE device IN (${device:sqlstring})
GROUP BY yyyymm ORDER BY yyyymm

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m', CAST(yyyymm AS STRING))) as time,
  ROUND(AVG(p75_lcp), 0) as avg_lcp
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE device IN (${device:sqlstring})
AND p75_lcp IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY yyyymm ORDER BY yyyymm

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m', CAST(yyyymm AS STRING))) as time,
  ROUND(AVG(p75_inp), 0) as avg_inp
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE device IN (${device:sqlstring})
AND p75_inp IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY yyyymm ORDER BY yyyymm

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m', CAST(yyyymm AS STRING))) as time,
  ROUND(AVG(p75_cls), 2) as avg_cls
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE device IN (${device:sqlstring})
AND p75_cls IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY yyyymm ORDER BY yyyymm

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m', CAST(yyyymm AS STRING))) as time,
  ROUND(AVG(p75_fcp), 0) as avg_fcp
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE device IN (${device:sqlstring})
AND p75_fcp IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY yyyymm ORDER BY yyyymm

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m', CAST(yyyymm AS STRING))) as time,
  ROUND(AVG(p75_ttfb), 0) as avg_ttfb
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE device IN (${device:sqlstring})
AND p75_ttfb IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY yyyymm ORDER BY yyyymm

panels.title: CWV Status Changes vs Previous Month
panels.description: Sites that changed CWV pass/fail status compared to the previous month. Regressions (PASS to FAIL) shown first.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT MAX(yyyymm) as max_month FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
),
prev_month AS (
  SELECT MAX(yyyymm) as prev FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
  WHERE yyyymm < (SELECT max_month FROM latest)
),
cur AS (
  SELECT origin, device, dealer_name, p75_lcp, p75_inp, p75_cls,
    CASE WHEN p75_lcp <= 2500 AND p75_inp <= 200 AND p75_cls <= 0.10 THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END as cwv
  FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
  WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT max_month FROM latest)
  AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})
),
prev AS (
  SELECT origin, device, p75_lcp, p75_inp, p75_cls,
    CASE WHEN p75_lcp <= 2500 AND p75_inp <= 200 AND p75_cls <= 0.10 THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END as cwv
  FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
  WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT prev FROM prev_month)
  AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})
)
SELECT
  c.origin, c.dealer_name, c.device,
  CASE WHEN p.cwv = 'PASS' AND c.cwv = 'FAIL' THEN 'REGRESSED'
       WHEN p.cwv = 'FAIL' AND c.cwv = 'PASS' THEN 'IMPROVED'
  END as status_change,
  ROUND(c.p75_lcp, 0) as lcp,
  ROUND(c.p75_lcp - p.p75_lcp, 0) as lcp_delta,
  ROUND(c.p75_inp, 0) as inp,
  ROUND(c.p75_inp - p.p75_inp, 0) as inp_delta,
  ROUND(c.p75_cls, 3) as cls,
  ROUND(c.p75_cls - p.p75_cls, 3) as cls_delta
FROM cur c
INNER JOIN prev p ON c.origin = p.origin AND c.device = p.device
WHERE c.cwv != p.cwv
ORDER BY
  CASE WHEN p.cwv = 'PASS' AND c.cwv = 'FAIL' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
  ABS(c.p75_lcp - p.p75_lcp) DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT
  TRIM(brand) as brand,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_lcp <= 2500) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as lcp_good_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_inp <= 200) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as inp_good_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as cls_good_pct
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`,
UNNEST(SPLIT(oem_brand, ',')) as brand
WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)
AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})
AND oem_brand IS NOT NULL AND oem_brand != ''
GROUP BY brand
HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY lcp_good_pct ASC

SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT origin) as origins_with_data,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.origins` WHERE is_active = TRUE) as total_origins
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)

SELECT
  state,
  COUNT(DISTINCT origin) as sites,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_lcp <= 2500 AND p75_inp <= 200 AND p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as cwv_pass_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_lcp <= 2500) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as lcp_pass_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_inp <= 200) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as inp_pass_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as cls_pass_pct
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)
AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})
AND state IS NOT NULL AND state != ''
GROUP BY state
HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5
ORDER BY cwv_pass_pct ASC

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m', CAST(yyyymm AS STRING))) as time,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(device = 'phone' AND p75_lcp <= 2500 AND p75_inp <= 200 AND p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNTIF(device = 'phone'), 0), 1) as phone,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(device = 'desktop' AND p75_lcp <= 2500 AND p75_inp <= 200 AND p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNTIF(device = 'desktop'), 0), 1) as desktop,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(device = 'tablet' AND p75_lcp <= 2500 AND p75_inp <= 200 AND p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNTIF(device = 'tablet'), 0), 1) as tablet
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE device IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY yyyymm ORDER BY yyyymm

SELECT
  CASE rank
    WHEN 1000 THEN 'Top 1K' WHEN 10000 THEN 'Top 10K' WHEN 100000 THEN 'Top 100K'
    WHEN 500000 THEN 'Top 500K' WHEN 1000000 THEN 'Top 1M' WHEN 5000000 THEN 'Top 5M'
    WHEN 10000000 THEN 'Top 10M' WHEN 50000000 THEN 'Top 50M' WHEN 100000000 THEN 'Top 100M'
    ELSE CAST(rank AS STRING)
  END as traffic_tier,
  COUNT(DISTINCT origin) as sites,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_lcp <= 2500 AND p75_inp <= 200 AND p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as cwv_pass_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_lcp <= 2500) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as lcp_pass_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_inp <= 200) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as inp_pass_pct,
  ROUND(COUNTIF(p75_cls <= 0.10) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as cls_pass_pct
FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`
WHERE yyyymm = (SELECT MAX(yyyymm) FROM `bigquery-dealeron-reporting.dealeron_site_speed.cwv_monthly`)
AND device IN (${device:sqlstring})
AND rank IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY rank ORDER BY rank
